titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that for purposes of veterans' compensation, service-connected total deafness shall be rated as a 100 percent disability.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/8/1987--Introduced. Rates service-connected total deafness in both ears as a total disability for veterans' disability compensation purposes.
